column4: Hi. I have a computer set up to be a masquerading router. I want it to serve DNS to the computers on the local network since the external dns servers are assigned by DHCP and may be changing. What (caching,recursive?) DNS server could I use?
Preferably one that just looks at my resolv.conf and asks those nameservers
I think named is the usual
that package isn't available to me. Is it called "named"?
